name: MOD Unity
short_description:
MOD Unity is a MOD management tool for MOD developers and MOD Users alike.  It caters to the Bethesda line of games using the Havok engine.  Initially, it will support Fallout 3 and Fallout New Vegas.  Eventually, it will encompass The Elder Scrolls (TES) series (Morrowind, Oblivion, and Skyrim) plus any successors.

MOD users will benefit greatly from its MOD management tools.  Additionally, MOD developers will benefit from its suite of tools to detect conflict, manage relationships and reduce resource duplication.
summary: MOD Unity: Tool for MOD managment and development
